On 9/20/11, adamsafran <adamsafran@...> wrote:
>
> <OLD - WHEELIE>
>
> WHEELIE was lost over in contemplation.  The DINOBOTS had never been openly
> hostile to other Autobots, and thsi would have transferred over to MAXIMALS
> as well in theory.  But he had not heard from his friends mostly since the
> end of the GREAT WAR.  What had changed in that period of time that had
> shifted?  From the mere snippets of stories he had heard, it did not sound
> as if the DINOBOTS had been reprogramed in any such way.
>
> Much less literally a full scale assault over upon a shuttle, an act which
> he could not fathom them doing.  Either they were not control of their own
> shells, they were merely lookalikes in some way..  Or something horrible had
> happened the likes of which he could not iamgine.
>
> Getting static over from his communicator and not able to pick up anything
> beyond visual range on his scanners, he could not leave here to search for
> anyone without the possibility of going through thousands of kilometers of
> rainforest in random directions with no guarantee of finding anyone.
>
> WHEELIE paused quietly, and as he lsitened to the two, he took out a small
> datapadd, and on it he began taking notes.  Of MAGMATRON, of SABREBACK.  Of
> this small outpost out in the middle of nowhere.  Of the incapacitated
> RODIMUS.  Of the escapees who were hiding.  Writing it to try and make it
> make sense.  Using an old Quintesson binary sequencing which was obvious
> enough to anyone who knew the language, but he didn't expect many Maximals
> of this era who were not historians to have had any encounters with it,
> which made it safe enough to record his thoughts in.
>
> Glancing over at the group as they came out, he said simply, "We wait.
> Eventually, things will abate."

<NEW>

There was a nod from UNUS, "A very prudent course." he said in a
sagely manner. "There are more things in this jungle, good Wheelie,
Than can be dreamt of in most poeple's philsophy."

ASTRA smiled as she stood next to UNUS while looking at WHEELIE,
"Perhaps he would like something to eat, to recharge himself while he
awaits what ever he is awaiting?"

UNUS nodded, "Of course my dear of course." He patted ASTRA on the
shoulder as he smiled, "Why don't you take him and go get some energon
for him."

FIREHORN just shook his head. "There she goes again. She takes in all
the strays."

UNUS glanced at FIREHORN, "There is something that can be learned from
her giving nature. Something that even you can learn."

FIREHORN grunted but said nothing else.

"Darkhoof, go see whatelse you can find out about the others that have
come in tothe jungle."

DARKHOOF nodded and then as if like a lightswitched being turned off
he vanished from sight.

Meanwhile ASTRA turned to WHEELIE with her bright and cheeye smile,
"Shall we then?" she holds an arm out for WHEELIE to take if he liked.

(TAG)

Preston
